item.title: Please Don't Call Me QA
item.description: Photo by Gabriel Before we dive deep into something serious, relax, let’s start with a joke: How many QA does it take to change a light bulb? None, we just report the darkness. — RoboCoonie™ | Fluffo™ (@RoboCoonie) December 24, 2008 Funny? True? Now, let me tell you a truth from the darkness: I don’t like people calling me QA, especially those who know me.
